server:property-ui.label: Cloud Foundry Password
server:property-ui.description: The password of the account that will interact with Cloud Foundry system.

server:property-ui.label: Application Name
server:property-ui.description: The name of the application to use when deployed. Required if not using a manifest.

server:property-ui.label: Application Path
server:property-ui.description: Name of zip file or other file to push. If this file isn't in your working directory you must specify a full file path. (Otherwise just the name of the file e.g. 'myApp.zip')

server:property-ui.label: Organization
server:property-ui.description: The name of the organization where the application will be deployed.

server:property-ui.label: Space
server:property-ui.description: The name of the space within the organization that the application will be deployed. (e.g some-space)

server:property-ui.label: Manifest file
server:property-ui.description: Name of the manifest file. If this file isn't in your working directory you must specify a full file path. (Otherwise just the name of the file e.g. 'manifest.xml')

server:property-ui.label: Domain
server:property-ui.description: Set a custom domain to be used when deploying the application.

server:property-ui.label: Sub-domain
server:property-ui.description: Define a sub-domain for your application. This is useful to ensure that the URL route for the application is unique within the domain.

server:property-ui.label: Number of instances
server:property-ui.description: The number of instances of the application that will be created.

server:property-ui.label: Memory limit
server:property-ui.description: The memory limit (e.g., 256M, 1024M, 1G).

server:property-ui.label: Disk limit
server:property-ui.description: The disk limit (e.g. 256M, 1024M, 1G).

server:property-ui.label: Custom buildpack
server:property-ui.description: Custom buildpack by name (e.g. my-buildpack) or GIT URL (e.g. https://github.com/heroku/heroku-buildpack-play.git).

server:property-ui.label: Stack
server:property-ui.description: Stack to use (a stack is a pre-built file system, including an operating system, that can run apps).

server:property-ui.label: Timeout
server:property-ui.description: Maximum time (in seconds) to wait for application start, other server side timeouts may apply.

server:property-ui.label: No start
server:property-ui.description: Does not start the application if selected.

server:property-ui.label: No route
server:property-ui.description: Does not create a URL route for the application if selected. Manually create and map a route later.

server:property-ui.label: No manifest
server:property-ui.description: Ignore the manifest file if one exists.

server:property-ui.label: No hostname
server:property-ui.description: Map the root domain to this application.

server:property-ui.label: Random route
server:property-ui.description: Create a random route for this app.

server:property-ui.label: Skip SSL Validation
server:property-ui.description: If checked, SSL validation will be skipped.
